China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ 2024 年 1 月 31 日星期三 13:29:28 GMT 120
India deploys unprecedented naval might near Red Sea to rein in piracyIndia has deployed at least a dozen warships east of the Red Sea to provide security against pirates and has investigated more than 250 vessels as Western powers focus on attacks by Yemen's Iran-backed Houthis, Indian officials said. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 13:20:50 GMT C253AANB3JKCDD4VJJE66JREVE https://www.reuters.com/world/india-deploys-unprecedented-naval-might-near-red-sea-rein-piracy-2024-01-31/Krishn Kaushik世界
German dealership Sternauto opens BYD store in BerlinChinese EV giant BYD's five models on sale in Germany will be showcased at a new BYD-only store in Berlin run by dealership Sternauto, in the latest sign that the carmaker is rapidly encroaching on European competitors' turf. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 12:38:25 GMT 3UP22OTNYVNTXOQ5KT44HZXHJA https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/german-dealership-sternauto-opens-byd-store-berlin-2024-01-31/Victoria Waldersee, Annegret Hilse商业汽车与交通
China's Country Garden looks to sell $570 million London developmentChinese property developer Country Garden has put its 450 million pound ($570 million) residential development in East London up for sale as it presses ahead with asset disposals at home and overseas after defaulting on its offshore debt. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 12:11:12 GMT SIWIWC2LW5PBDINR55ZXE24PPU https://www.reuters.com/business/chinas-country-garden-looks-sell-570-million-london-development-2024-01-31/Reuters商业
Exclusive: Chinese automakers hit by production issues with Huawei computing unitSome Chinese automakers have had to delay deliveries of flagship models due to production issues with a computing unit made by tech giant Huawei (HWT.UL), five people with knowledge of the matter said. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 11:32:42 GMT MFUGYXYSY5I5BHOV3AOATXQJGU https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/chinese-automakers-hit-by-production-issues-with-huawei-computing-unit-sources-2024-01-31/Reuters商业汽车与交通
Thermo Fisher forecasts 2024 profit below estimates on biotech demand slumpMedical equipment maker Thermo Fisher Scientific forecast annual profit and revenue below Wall Street estimates on Wednesday, signaling that a slump in demand for its services used to make therapeutics and vaccines will continue. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 11:28:08 GMT HLMV4WL7DBKJ7FAZMU7CGTE72E https://www.reuters.com/business/healthcare-pharmaceuticals/thermo-fisher-forecasts-2024-profit-below-estimates-biotech-demand-slump-2024-01-31/Reuters商业医疗保健与制药
Morning Bid: Megacaps stumble at high bar as Fed decision awaitedA look at the day ahead in US and global markets from Mike Dolan Wed, 31 Jan 2024 11:27:16 GMT PJN6ZYTDZ5MKNAH46V5HCGHSNE https://www.reuters.com/markets/us/global-markets-view-usa-2024-01-31/Reuters市场美国市场
US says fentanyl talks with China 'meaningful' but more needs to be done-officialTalks between the U.S. and Chinese officials on stemming the flow of chemicals used for the production of deadly fentanyl have been "substantive" but "much more" needs to be done, the head of the White House delegation to Beijing said on Wednesday. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 11:04:27 GMT UXX5QVAOSBIXXKWZARNXFZXT7A https://www.reuters.com/world/us-says-fentanyl-talks-with-china-meaningful-more-needs-be-done-official-2024-01-31/Antoni Slodkowski世界
Apple set for modest iPhone sales growth, China worries remainApple iPhone sales likely rose 3% in the key holiday period, the best growth in five quarters, but analysts expect a tough year for the company in China, where it faces regulatory headwinds and resurgent competition from Huawei. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 11:02:20 GMT 4KJ52LPHOVPYTHZ3UG5WZTLFRA https://www.reuters.com/technology/apple-set-modest-iphone-sales-growth-china-worries-remain-2024-01-31/Yuvraj Malik技术
Taiwan military simulates China turning drills into an attackTaiwan's military on Wednesday simulated a scenario where China suddenly turns one of its regular drills around the island into an actual attack, on the same day China staged another "combat readiness patrol" near Taiwan. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 10:37:27 GMT B4LLUS67O5PRJF7MOW6马拉蒂https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-military-simulates-china-turning-drills-into-an-attack-2024-01-31/Fabian Hamacher世界亚太地区
Chinese hackers are targeting US infrastructure, FBI chief to testifyChinese hackers are targeting critical infrastructure in the US, preparing to cause "real-world harm" to Americans, the FBI chief plans to tell a panel on Wednesday. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 10:15:10 GMT I4YYTKHNUFNSHKT3WZ2F4QA3DI https://www.reuters.com/technology/cybersecurity/chinese-hackers-are-targeting-us-infrastruct-fbi-chief-testify-2024-01-31/Andrew Goudsward技术网络安全
The logistics of war: How Washington is preparing for a Chinese invasion of TaiwanThe United States is increasingly worried that in the coming years Chinese President Xi Jinping could order his military to seize Taiwan. So the US military is trying to play catch-up in a critical area: its logistics network. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 10:06:35 GMT YLTKK6MJLBM6HJ6KJWQMUEFN5I https://www.reuters.com/world/china/logistics-war-how-washington-is-preparing-chinese-invasion-taiwan-2024-01-31/Phil Stewart, Idrees Ali世界中国
